questions:
What is the photo mainly about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Textures and surfaces

Where was the photo likely taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a museum
D) Outdoors on a stone surface

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A person
B) A landscape
C) Carved letters on a stone surface
D) An animal

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A person
B) A tree
C) The letters "OFF"
D) A flower

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A cityscape
B) A beach
C) A textured stone surface
D) A forest

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A person
B) A car
C) Carved letters on a stone surface
D) A building

What texture is depicted in the photo?
A) Smooth
B) Rough and weathered
C) Metallic
D) Soft and fluffy

What is the relationship between the elements in the photo?
A) They are all part of a landscape
B) They are all part of a textured stone surface
C) They are all part of a family gathering
D) They are all part of a sports event

What word is carved into the stone?
A) ON
B) OFF
C) STOP
D) GO

What is the likely material of the surface in the photo?
A) Wood
B) Metal
C) Stone
D) Plastic

What is the color of the stone surface?
A) Bright blue
B) Dark green
C) Gray with patches of white
D) Red

What is the orientation of the carved letters?
A) Horizontal
B) Vertical
C) Diagonal
D) Circular

What does the photo suggest about the maintenance of the stone surface?
A) Regularly maintained
B) Neglected and weathered
C) Recently cleaned
D) Frequently painted

What is the likely size of the stone surface?
A) Small, handheld
B) Medium, like a stepping stone
C) Large, like a wall or monument
D) Tiny, like a pebble

What is the most prominent feature of the photo?
A) The color
B) The texture
C) The letters
D) The background

What does the photo emphasize?
A) Motion
B) Stillness
C) Light
D) Sound

What is the likely angle of the photo?
A) Aerial view
B) Side view
C) Close-up view
D) Distant view

What is the likely origin of the stone?
A) Natural formation
B) Man-made carving
C) Industrial product
D) Synthetic material

What is the likely texture of the lichen on the stone?
A) Smooth and slippery
B) Rough and dry
C) Wet and slimy
D) Soft and furry

What is the likely age of the lichen on the stone?
A) Newly grown
B) Several years old
C) Decades old
D) Centuries old
